2. Hyperactivity and impulsivity: Six (or more) of the follow-

gree that is inconsistent with developmental level and that
negatively impacts directly on social and academic/occupa-
tional activities:
Attention-Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder 33
Note: The symptoms are not solely a manifestation of oppo-
sitional behavior, defiance, hostility, or a failure to under-
stand tasks or instructions. For older adolescents and adults
(age 17 and older), at least five symptoms are required.

seat.
b. Often leaves seat in situations when remaining seated is
expected (e.g., leaves his or her place in the classroom,
in the office or other workplace, or in other situations that
require remaining in place).
